lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. bank holding companies have what it termed easily realizable capital resources available to them, such as undervalued real estate, appreciated portfolio securities and overfunded pension plans.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S and P noted that while Argentina, Brazil, Mexico and Venezuela each face unique economic problems, the lack of progress toward moderating their debt service burdens has been disappointing.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Most bank managements appear committed to improving the quality of their balance sheets," S and P said, noting many now emphasize long-term strategies over short-term earnings.
